de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm

Class NormalizedGoogleDistanceLikeComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TermSimilarityMeasureBase

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimilarityMeasure, TermSimilarityMeasure

    public class NormalizedGoogleDistanceLikeComparator
extends TermSimilarityMeasureBase
    Computes a distance value similar to the Normalized Google Distance (Cilibrasi & Vitanyi, 2004).
    Author:
    zesch
